content: this blanket is a stashbuster i used many different yarn colors and four or five different brands of #4 worsted weight yarn so the total amount of yarn listed is approximate this pattern does not teach you overlay mosaic crochet it contains charts and written instructions for the first 10 row the charts have xs on them where double_crochet stitches should go any yarn weight and corresponding hook size can be used this blanket was made using a 5mm hook and a 4 5mm hook for the border at least two contrasting colors should be used i added the colors i used to make the blanket in the picture to the pattern
